item.title: Found It!: Software Engineering at Google
item.author: Siavash Sakhavi
item.description: In my last post, I was shared what my concerns were regarding software development and what my role as a Tech Lead should look at AISG. Today, I had an awesome find! One thing led to another I was looking at my youtube subscriptions, and I saw video posted on the “Dev Interrupted” channel. If you aren’t subscribed to it, I highly recommend it. I recall I found the channel when Luca Rossi, the owner of the amazing “Refactoring” newsletter, mentioned it in one of the issues of his newsletter (Thanks Luca!
